meanings: run around getting information from the people concerned

vlive.korean: 관련자 리스트를 이한영 대표가 갖고 있었는데 사건이 벌어진 거죠. And the list of people related to this case was owned by CEO Lee Hanyoung. 듣기 View video 아이엠 (I am) : <사랑, 기억에 머물다> 3-1화 [관계의시작]
vlive.english: And the list of people related to this case was owned by CEO Lee Hanyoung.

examples.korean: Everyone involved was sworn to secrecy. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 모든 관련자들이 비밀 엄수를 맹세했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Everyone involved was sworn to secrecy. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This incident reflects badly on everyone involved. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 사건으로 관련자 모두가 좋지 않게 인식되게 되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: This incident reflects badly on everyone involved. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We plan to strictly censure those involved. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 관련자를 엄중 문책할 방침이다 Neungyule
examples.english: We plan to strictly censure those involved. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: notify one's intentions to the party concerned 듣기 Add to Wordbook 자기 의도를 관련자에게 통보하다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: notify one's intentions to the party concerned Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Much of the testimony of those involved is consistent. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 관련자들의 진술이 상당 부분 일치한다 Neungyule
examples.english: Much of the testimony of those involved is consistent. Add to Wordbook
